channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Test de la MSI Claw A8 BZ2EM : l’alternative grand écran à la Xbox Ally X
item.description: MSI tente le salto en intégrant pour la première fois une puce AMD à ses PC consoles portables. Voici la MSI Claw A8 BZ2EM, qui ne compte plus sur Intel pour soutenir ses jeux.

item.title: Mullvad retires OpenVPN support on desktop, pushing all users to WireGuard
item.description: Mullvad has removed OpenVPN support from its desktop app, accelerating its shift to WireGuard as users prepare for the full OpenVPN shutdown in 2026.

item.title: Relax, grown-ups: VR is doing fine
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. When news broke last week that Meta may cut the budget of its Meta Reality Labs unit by as much as 30 percent, followed by reports that the company is […]

item.title: Lawsuit claims ChatGPT put a ‘target’ on murdered woman
item.description: OpenAI is facing a wrongful death lawsuit after a 56-year-old man killed his mother and took his own life after delusion-filled conversations with ChatGPT. The lawsuit, filed in a California court on Thursday, accuses ChatGPT of putting a "target" on the back of 83-year-old Suzanne Adams, who was killed at her Connecticut home in August. […]

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un super pack gaming signé Razer (casque, souris, tapis)
item.description: C'est le jour 11 du calendrier de l'Avent de Frandroid et on vous fait gagner un trio de produits axés esport et signés Razer (casque, souris et tapis).

item.title: Elon Musk destroyed Twitter — now Operation Bluebird has revealed a shock plan to bring it back in 2026
item.description: Operation Bluebird is filing to take back the Twitter brand and 'tweet,' but I wonder if this is a quixotic adventure.

item.title: State AGs warn Google, Meta, and OpenAI that their chatbots could be breaking the law
item.description: State attorneys general from across the US are demanding more accountability from AI companies, warning them that their chatbots may be violating state laws. As reported by Reuters, the AGs have given Meta, Google, OpenAI, and others a deadline of January 16th, 2026 to respond to demands for more safety measures for generative AI, saying […]

item.title: Are you a startup looking to build your website? Webflow is offering a crazy deal- get 100% off your first full year of a CMS site plan
item.description: This is a great end-of-the-year opportunity for any startup company.

item.title: Game Awards 2025 : comment et à quelle heure suivre la cérémonie du jeu vidéo en direct ?
item.description: Encore quelques heures avant la cérémonie des Game Awards 2025, les Oscars du jeu vidéo. Un événement autant attendu par les gamers que la presse spécialisée, si bien que la cérémonie sera diffusée pour la première fois sur une plateforme de streaming.

item.title: Xiaomi ne fera pas que des voitures électriques : un brevet trahit ce changement de stratégie
item.description: Xiaomi va bel et bien produire et vendes des voitures dotées d'un moteur thermique. Des hybrides ? Des voitures électriques à prolongateur d'autonomie ? C'est bien possible, comme nous le prouve ce nouveau brevet bien utile.

item.title: Ford and SK On are ending their U.S. battery joint venture
item.description: The factories live on; the joint venture will not.

item.title: A pair of Nintendo Switch 2 Joy-Con 2 controllers are $20 off at BJ’s
item.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 comes with a pair of Joy-Con 2 controllers, but it’s always good to have a second set around in case more people come over for a few rounds of Mario Kart World. BJ’s Wholesale Club is offering a set of Joy-Con 2 controllers for $79.99 ($20 off), a new all-time low. […]

item.title: CES 2026 preview: What to expect from tech's biggest conference in January
item.description: CES doesn't start until January, but whispers of the products and announcements that could be in store for tech's biggest annual conference have already started to take shape. The CES 2026 show floor is officially open from January 6 through 9, although the show kicks off with events on Sunday January 4 and a host of press conferences on Monday. As always, product demos, announcements and networking will be happening at the Las Vegas Convention Center and surrounding hotels all over the city. As usual, Engadget will be covering the event in-person and remotely, bringing you news and hands-ons ...

item.title: Vous avez une Kindle ? Amazon a une bonne nouvelle pour vous
item.description: Amazon prépare un petit changement qui va redonner un peu d’air aux lecteurs sur Kindle.

item.title: The best Christmas gifts to give everyone on your 2025 holiday shopping list
item.description: Finding the right gifts for everyone on your list this time of year can be a major source of stress. It can be even more daunting if you’re trying to stick to a budget all while getting the folks you love things that they will really appreciate. But there’s also a good chance you’re getting fed bad gift ideas (and just as bad deals) if you’re browsing the web frantically searching as we get closer and closer to the holidays.Allow us at Engadget to help you through it. Here, you’ll find all of our holiday gift guides collected in one place, so you can more easily find the best Christmas gifts y...

item.title: Darth Vader’s Lightsaber Is No Longer the Most Expensive ‘Star Wars’ Item Sold at Auction
item.description: Tom Jung's original 1977 half-sheet artwork for 'A New Hope' has just become the priciest piece of memorabilia from the galaxy far, far away.

item.title: Cursor Launches an AI Coding Tool For Designers
item.description: The 300-person startup hopes bringing designers aboard will give it an edge in an increasingly competitive AI software market.

item.title: 33 practical smart home gifts that make everyday life a little easier
item.description: Smart home products are all about making everyday life a little easier, which is why they're some of the best and most thoughtful gifts you can give. Some people go all out building a multi-gadget IoT kingdom (like our resident smart home expert, Jen Pattison Tuohy), but a smart home is whatever your recipient wants […]

item.description: All the ways to watch Luke Littler vs Darius Labanauskas live streams from anywhere, as they open World Darts Championship 2026 at Alexandra Palace.

item.title: How to watch Celtic vs AS Roma: Europa League 2025/26 free stream, TV channels, kick-off time

item.description: Et si à Noël vous surpreniez votre enfant en déposant sa première montre connectée au pied du sapin ? Bouygues Telecom propose la Kids Watch, un modèle abordable et spécialement pensé pour les 9 ans et plus.

item.title: ‘They gave us the iPhone camera’: F1 producer Jerry Bruckheimer on Apple’s ‘phenomenal’ involvement in the movie’s production
item.description: We spoke with F1 producer Jerry Bruckheimer ahead of the film's streaming release on Apple TV.

item.title: ICO levies £1.2 million fine against LastPass — data breach compromised info on 1.6 million users
item.description: After a data breach in 2022, the Information Commissioners Office has finally reached a decision on a £1.2 million fine.

item.title: One of our favorite budgeting apps is 50 percent off for new users
item.description:
With a new year just around the corner, now is the perfect time to take stock of your finances. A budgeting app can help with that, and right now you can get 50 percent off your first year of a Monarch Money plan. All you need to do is enter the code MONARCHVIP at checkout and you’ll pay $50 for the initial 12 months instead of the regular price of $100. Note that the offer only applies to new users.
Monarch Money was the runner-up in our guide to the best budgeting apps in 2025, and it was definitely a grower. Initially we found the experience of using the app to be needlessly complicated c...

item.title: The 10 best last-minute Christmas gifts for the 2025 holiday season
item.description: We’re almost out of time — the holidays are just about here, and if you’re still doing your holiday shopping, you’re not alone. Between wrapping things up at work before some well-deserved time off and making sure you have everything you need to host family and friends, it can be hard to find the time to go shop for some gifts. And if you’re going to physical stores right now, you’re probably being met with half-empty shelves. But the internet remains an option, even this late in the game: you still have time to buy holiday gifts online.USPS, UPS and FedEx have laid out their holiday shipping ...

item.title: Sen. Ed Markey wants media companies to fight for the First Amendment
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Sen. Ed Markey of Massachusetts, and you’ll hear me start with the only question I think anyone should be asking any politician in the federal government right now: What the hell is going on here? Sen. Markey didn’t mince words with his answer. You’ll hear him compare the Trump administration to […]

item.title: Disney vend son âme à OpenAI. Le prix ? 1 milliard de dollars !
item.description: Le groupe Disney prête ses jouets à OpenAI. Le géant du divertissement autorise Sora et ChatGPT à exploiter les personnages de ses univers pour générer des vidéos et des images. L’accord inclut un investissement massif de Disney dans la start-up IA. Mais pendant qu’il ouvre grand la porte à OpenAI, Disney en referme une autre avec fracas : le groupe accuse Google d’enfreindre massivement ses droits d’auteur et lui a adressé une mise en demeure....

item.title: A Nintendo Switch 2 Price Hike Is Almost Certainly Coming Soon
item.description: You can once again blame AI, this time for gaming getting more expensive.

item.title: No Need to Buy Earbuds or Speakers, Denon Offers a Subscription for Its Gadgets and Is Waiving Activation Fees for Limited Holiday Deals
item.description: Enjoy bold, rich, and premium sound without blowing your budget.

item.title: « Violation massive » : Disney déclare la guerre à Google et exige la correction immédiate de Gemini
item.description: OpenAI et Google sont désormais en guerre ouverte, et Disney a choisi son camp. Le géant du cinéma poursuit Google pour violation du droit d'auteur, tout en misant 1 milliard de dollars sur ChatGPT.

item.title: Record-low price alert: Weve never seen the AirPods Pro 3 this cheap at Walmart
item.description: The Apple AirPods Pro 3 are on sale at Walmart for $199, down from the list price of $249. That's a 20% discount.

item.title: Alpine A390 ou Porsche Macan électrique : on compare ces deux voitures ultra performantes
item.description: Alpine vient tout juste de présenter le plus grand véhicule de son histoire avec l'A390, une voiture électrique avec pas moins de trois moteurs. Il s'attaque de front au Porsche Macan, un SUV clairement assumé et qui est récemment passé au 100 % électrique.

item.title: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 drop to a new record low of $199
item.description:
No need to fret if you missed out on some of the best Black Friday deals this year — some of them have returned already. Case in point: Apple's AirPods Pro 3, which came out in September this year, are on sale for a new record low of $199. That's 20 percent off and better than the discount we saw during Black Friday and Cyber Monday. With the new AirPods Pro, Apple made some big improvements, including better battery life and sound quality, and introduced useful new features, such as Live Translation.
The AirPods Pro 3 are the best AirPods available today, with Apple's H2 chip, and earned a ...

item.title: Cette récente montre connectée avec plus de 10 jours d’autonomie connait sa première baisse de prix intéressante sur Amazon
item.description: Loin derrière les prix des Garmin, Polar et autres montres sportives premium, l'Amazfit Balance 2 nous a bluffés lors de notre prise en main. Sur Amazon, elle entame même ses premières baisses de prix et passe à 269 euros au lieu de 299 euros.

item.title: Ready to capture your adventures in 360? The DJI Osmo 360 camera just reached its lowest price ever
item.description: As of Dec. 11, the DJI Osmo 360 camera combo is down to $479.99. That saves you over $100 on this action camera.

item.description: Disney says that alongside the agreement, it will "become a major customer of OpenAI," as it will use its APIs to build new products, tools, and experiences, including for Disney+.

item.title: Against the Federal Moratorium on State-Level Regulation of AI
item.description: The common refrain that a patchwork of regulations would kill innovation doesn't pass the smell test.

item.title: « Ça permet de voir la peau de quelqu’un plus en détail ? » : Donald Trump parle de la 6G sans avoir la moindre idée de ce dont il s’agit
item.description: Lors d'une réunion filmée, le président des États-Unis s'est mis à parler de la 6G sans savoir ce que c'est. La preuve en images.

item.title: Alerte rouge sur Google Chrome : une mystérieuse faille de sécurité est exploitée par des pirates
item.description: Google vient de déployer une mise à jour d’urgence de Chrome. Le correctif vise à colmater une faille de sécurité déjà exploitée par des cybercriminels. L'éditeur n'a pas communiqué beaucoup d'informations sur la vulnérabilité par mesure de précaution.

item.title: Over 200,000 power banks sold on Amazon are being recalled for a fire risk
item.description: A company called INIU has issued a recall for its BI-B41 10,000mAh power banks because the lithium-ion batteries they use "can overheat and ignite, posing fire and burn hazards to consumers." The company has received 15 reports of the power banks overheating resulting in 11 fires causing over $380,000 in property damage and three minor […]

item.title: On Me raises $6M to shake up the gift card industry
item.description: On Me raises $6 million for its digital gift card platform that lets users purchase cards categorized by interests rather than being restricted to specific retailers.

item.title: Quantifying the hidden costs of cloud sovereignty gaps
item.description: Recent outages are symptoms of an over-reliance on US based hyperscalers.

item.description: The studio has announced a landmark deal and $1 billion investment with OpenAI to bring hundreds of Disney characters to its generative AI platforms.

item.description: The carrier’s Connected Life platform, now available nationwide, lets AT&T customers easily set up a smart-home security system.

item.title: AT&T’s new home security system is powered by Google Home and Abode
item.description: AT&T is launching Connected Life, a new smart home security offering built around Google Home that keeps working during power or internet outages. Connected Life can be self-installed and features smart home cameras from Google Nest and security hardware from Abode, as well as professional monitoring. This follows Google launching APIs for its smart home […]...

item.title: Trump’s tariffs have cost U.S. households $1,200 each, Democrats say
item.description: According to Democrats on Congress’ Joint Economic Committee, Trump’s tariffs have cost the average American household almost $1,200 since he began his second term. Sweeping taxes on imports have cost the average American household nearly $1,200 since Donald Trump returned to the White House this year, according to calculations by Democrats on Congress’ Joint Economic Committee.Using Treasury Department numbers on revenue from tariffs and Goldman Sachs estimates of who ends up paying for them, the Democrats’ report Thursday found that American consumers’ share of the bill came to nearly $159 b...

item.title: Plus de 100 marques chinoises de voitures électriques mais seulement 3 sont rentables : voici lesquelles
item.description: En Chine, il existe plus de 100 constructeurs automobile de voitures électriques. Mais seulement 3 d'entre eux sont rentables à l'heure actuelle. Voici lesquels.

item.title: Séisme dans le monde de l’IA : ChatGPT obtient les droits sur 200 personnages Disney
item.description: C'est un grand coup que vient de marquer OpenAI dans le monde de l'IA. La firme a signé un accord historique avec Disney pour avoir accès à 200 personnages du géant du cinéma.

item.title: MCON Review: You Won’t Find a More Compact Mobile Controller
item.description: Despite slighly odd ergonomics, the MCON will turn your phone into the handheld you want it to be.

item.title: Voici les 3 voitures électriques les plus vendues au monde : deux Tesla et une Chinoise qui arrive bientôt en Europe
item.description: Avec un bond de 32 % des ventes de voitures électriques au 3e trimestre 2025, une nouvelle hiérarchie émerge : BYD conforte sa première place et Geely s'impose en troisième position. Bien que défié par la concurrence chinoise, Tesla résiste solidement et place son Model Y à la tête des ventes.

item.title: Best Buy has a massive end-of-year sale on its best-selling TVs — cheap 4K TVs from $59.99
item.description: Best Buy's massive end-of-year TV sale is live, and I'm rounding up the best deals on 4K, QLED, and OLED TVs, with clearance prices starting at $59.99.

item.title: OpenAI signs deal to bring Disney characters to Sora and ChatGPT
item.description: It looks like Disney wasted no time delivering on CEO Bob Iger’s promise to bring AI-generated content to Disney+. On Thursday, the company announced the start of a three-year licensing agreement with OpenAI to bring more than 200 of its beloved characters, including those from Star Wars and Pixar, to the Sora app and ChatGPT. With the deal in place, OpenAI users will be able to prompt ChatGPT to generate images that tap into Disney’s intellectual property, with costumes, props, vehicles and environments covered. The agreement does not include voices or “talent likenesses,” meaning Sora users...

item.title: Appels d’urgence : Google active la vidéo en direct sur Android pour rattraper l’iPhone
item.description: Google déploie enfin la vidéo en direct pour les appels d'urgence sur Android. Une fonction vitale pour guider les secours, mais pas encore disponible en France.

item.title: The kid-friendly console that outsold Xbox during Black Friday is $50 off
item.description: The Nex Playground is a motion-controlled, cube-shaped console for ages five and up that’s selling like hotcakes. It came in third for home console sales during Black Friday week, according to sales data shared on Bluesky from Mat Piscatella of Circana, falling behind only Nintendo’s Switch 2 and Sony’s PlayStation 5. That’s an impressive feat […]

item.title: Philips Hue : comment bien débuter avec ces ampoules connectées ?
item.description: Vous avez envie d'équiper votre maison avec un éclairage intelligent ? Philips propose avec sa gamme Hue la plus grande gamme d'ampoules connectées. Comment choisir ses ampoules connectées Philips Hue et comment bien débuter ? Retrouvez les meilleurs kits de démarrage Philips Hue ainsi que nos explications.

item.title: TIME names ‘Architects of AI’ its Person of the Year
item.description: TIME Magazine has named the 'Architects of AI' its Person of the Year, who include Jensen Huang, Elon Musk, Sam Altman, Mark Zuckerberg, Lisa Su, Dario Amodei, Demis Hassabis, and Fei-Fei Li
